lines.text: And-and then I sneak out and before Monica can her parents come in.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: So I hide in the shower and the next thing you know theyre going at it right on the bathroom floor.

lines.speaker: lisa
lines.text: Oh my God!

lines.speaker: {transcribers note
lines.text: For further reading on the above story, please check out .}

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I got a good one, I got a good one! I once walked in on both my parents making love to the same guy.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Its so great seeing you guys again. Id like to make a toast.  Uh, as a poet once said, "In the sweetness of friendship, let there be laughter and sharing of pleasures for in the due of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed."

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ohh.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh my God, you guys!!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Before you say anything, have we got a story for you! Guess who we bumped into at dinner!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Who?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Richard!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What?  A-ohh!  Ohh. Oh thats right thats right. Thats Richards favorite place too.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh you knew that. Good!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I thought you were going out with Elizabeth.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah, I was but uh, she was a little busy with a water balloon fight.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh Ross, sometimes grown-ups have commitments they just cant get out of!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yknow, maybe she is too young for me. Yknow, when I was over there and she was running around with her friends, I felt like I was a baby-sitter. I finally started to see what you guys were talking about. I dont know what to do.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Why dont you just weigh out the good stuff about the relationship against the bad stuff. I mean thats what I did when I first  weighing stuff.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Okay umm, bad stuff. Well, Im-Im 12 years older than she is.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: If the school finds out youre fired.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Shes leaving for three months.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: For camp!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Okay, good stuff. Umm, well shes-shes sweet and pretty and

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Look Ross, the only question you need to ask is, "Do you see a future?" I mean like do you see yourself marrying her?  Oh my God! You did it already! You married her, didnt you?!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No! No! I didnt do that. Its just Okay, honestly no. I dont, I dont see a big future with her.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Okay well I think thats your answer.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ive got to talk to her. Ugh, I hate this part.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Hey, you have to forget about Elizabeth. I mean if youre not careful you may not get married at all this year!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Rach! Rachel! Okay, the next highest bidder is at table one.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh great!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh and uh the guy who got the Paris trip is at table four.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Why do you care about the guy who won the Paris trip?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Its a trip for two!  Excuse me.  Excuse me, is the person who won the Paris trip at this table?

lines.speaker: emil alexander
lines.text: That was me.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, en chante.

lines.speaker: {transcribers note
lines.text: Please correct my French .}

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Uhh, excuse me is there a Mr. Bowmont at this table?

lines.speaker: mr. bowmont
lines.text: Thats me.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Ahh, yes.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh well, hello. This is your lucky day Mr. Bowmont, the uh gentleman day sailer as just become available again and I believe that you made a bid of $18,000.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: You-you have to pay that! Its not just a guess.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay. Okay.

lines.speaker: mr. bowmont
lines.text: I was actually relieved uh I didnt win the boat. My wife wouldve killed me.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ohh

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Are you kidding me?! Shes gonna this boat!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Y-Yeah! What-what is your wifes name?

lines.speaker: mr. bowmont
lines.text: Its Pam.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Pam! Oh God okay, just imagine this, "The Pam."

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Aw-awww!

lines.speaker: mr. bowmont
lines.text: I dont think shed like that.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay, uh-uh imagine this, "The Mr. Bowmont."

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oooooh

lines.speaker: mr. bowmont
lines.text: I dont think so dear.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay look, let me paint you a little picture.  All right, you are settin sail up the Hudson! Youve got the wind in your harms! You-you get all that peace and quiet that youve always wanted! You get back to nature! You can go fishin! You canooh, you can get one of those little hats and have people call you captain, and then when youre old, Cappy.

lines.speaker: mr. bowmont
lines.text: What the hell, its for a good cause! All right!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: No way! Its mine!!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: What?! What?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: All that stuff you just said? I want that!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: But Joey you dont have $20,000!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Who cares?! I-Ill make payments, whatever it takes, I want the Mr. Bowmont!!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh my God, youre back!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Ohh, let me see it! Let me see your hand!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Why do you want to see my hand?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I wanna see whats in your hand. I wanna see the trash.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Eww! Oh, its all dirty. You should throw this out.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What did you guys just do?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: What happened?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Richard was there so I couldnt do it!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: What?! Noooo

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Im gonna do it tomorrow yknow, and-and surprise her, but now youve ruined it!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: We didnt ruin it!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Who walks into a room and asks to see a persons hands?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Well, a palm reader, a manicurist, a hand doctor

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Glove salesman!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Good one! Yeah.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: This is terrible. What am I going to do?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Look, she only suspects something okay? She doesnt know for sure, so just throw her off the track.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Thats right, I can throw her off. I can make her think marriage is the last thing on my mind.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah! Convince her that-that youre scared of commitment! Convince her that youre a little coward!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I can do that, Ive had 30 years of practice.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey, being you is finally gonna pay off!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I had to go all the way to the basement because some idiot keeps stuffing the trash chute with pizza boxes!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: That guys still doing that?!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Hey!  Oh my God youre here, let me see your hand!!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: No, youre too late!!! She already took out the trash!!!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Wow! I have never had such a healthy break-up! She was such a grown-up about it! She didnt seem too immature for me! Did I just make a huge mistake?

lines.speaker: elizabeth
lines.text: Ross! Wait!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Elizabeth, thank God! I was just thinking about

lines.speaker: elizabeth
lines.text: You suck!!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Okay, break-ups still on!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Okay, okay, here she comes!  How do I look? Do I look like a guy who doesnt want to get married?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah! And also, a little like a French guy.  I never noticed that before.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Hi guys!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Hey!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What are you up too?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh, just hanging out, talkin about uh, websites.  Yeah, we saw this really interesting website about marriage and how totally unnecessary it is and how its just a way for the government to keep tabs on you.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah, Big Brother.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Well thats a little crazy. Although I am yknow glad to hear that youre branching out on what you look at on the Internet.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah, well Yknow, it just got me thinking though, why would anybody ever want to get married huh?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Why?! To celebrate your relationship! To solidify your commitment! To declare your love for one another to the world!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Eh

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Okay well thats good to know.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: The Mr. Bowmonts here!!!

lines.speaker: waitress
lines.text: Hey Monica, theres a customer who wants to complement the chef, should I let him in?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Sure, I love this part!

lines.speaker: waitress
lines.text: Come on in.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Hi!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Richard!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Actually, Im not here to complement the chef.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ohh Oh, thats okay I hate when people come back to complement the chef. Like I have nothing better to do! So whats up?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Well, it was great seeing you the other night.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh, good to see you too. Did you come down here to tell me that?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: No! I came here to tell you something else.  I came here  to tell you I still love you.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What uhWhat did youWhat?!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: I still love you. And I know I probably shouldnt even be here telling you this, I mean youre with Chandler a guy I really like, and if you say hes straight Ill believe you! After seeing ya the other night I knew if I didnt tell ya Id regret it for the rest of my life. Letting you go was the stupidest thing I ever did.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yknow youre really not supposed to be back here!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Well yeah, Im sorry. I know this is the wrong time and the wrong place but I had to tell ya! I wanna spend my life with you. I wanna marry you. I wanna have kids with you.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh God  Why dont they put chairs back here?!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: I know this is crazy but am I too late?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What the Yes youre too late! Where was all this three years ago?!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Well I know I was an idiot! And I tried to forget you, I really did! Yknow after we had lunch last year I spent six months in Africa trying to get you out of my head!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What were you doing in Africa?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Working with blind kids.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ohhh! What are you doing to me?! Oh look, I-I Im sorry but umm, this- this-this-this is not going to happen.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Okay thats fine, Ill walk away. And Ill never bother you again, but only if you tell me Chandlers willing to give you everything I am.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Well he is! Yeah, I mean marriage is all he talks about! My goodness, in fact, Im the one thats making him wait!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: You are?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Why?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Why? Because of the government.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Isnt it incredible?! Monica and Chandler, gettin married.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I know, theyre gonna be so happy together.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ohh I mean two best friends falling in love, how often does that happen?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Not that often!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No! Im so happy for them!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Me too! So happy for them!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Im so happy and not at all jealous.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh no! No God, definitely not jealous!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I mean Im probably 98% happy, maybe 2% jealous. And I mean whats 2%? Thats nothing.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Totally. Im like 90/10.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah me too.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey uh, have you guys scene Chandler?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Whno, but yknow who did stop in here looking for ya, Tennille.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: So that marriage stuff that you were saying yesterday, you dont really believe that do you?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Sure I do. In fact, I think the whole concept of marriage is unnatural. I mean look at pigs. Lets take a second here and look at pigs. Okay pigs dont mate for life. I mean a pig can have like a hundred sexual partners in a lifetime, and thats just an ordinary pig not even a pig thats good at sports!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah, but thats pigs not people!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: If marriage worked, Id be all for it. But do you know what the divorce rate in this country is? 97%.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Wait a minute. Are you honestly telling me that-that you may never want to get married?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well, never say never but yknow probably uh yeah, never.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh my God! Then-then-then what are we even doing?! What is this?!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! What is all this pressure?! Is this some new kind of strategy? Why dont you put down your copy of The Rules huh mantrap?!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yknow what?! I gotta go! Ugh!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Its okay, I got a plan.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Were gonna find love!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Definitely!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah, Im pretty confident about that. Thats what makes it so easy for me to be 80% happy for Monica and Chandler! It would be nice to have a little guarantee though.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well yknow, some people make deals with a friend, like if neither of them are married by the time theyre 40, they marry each other.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: You mean a backup?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Exactly!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah, yeah I got that.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: You do?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Hm-mmm.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Who?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Joey.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Joey?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Are you serious?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah, I locked him years ago!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Wh So If neither of you are married by the time youre 40, youre gonna marry Joey.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yep, we shook on it. Yeah but believe me that is not how he wanted to seal the deal.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh, seriously?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Ohh, yeah. I think his exact words were

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Charming.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Well hey, its just a backup.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey Monica!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Have you seen Rachel? Or a mirror?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: This is for my boat, pretty cool huh?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah, its great.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Whoa-whoa, whats the matter?! Talk to the captain!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Im just having one of those days where you realize youre in a dead- end relationship!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Chandler giving you a hard time huh?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Its not like I want to get married tomorrow! Its just that I-Id like to believe that Im in a relationship thats actually going somewhere, that Im not just wasting my time!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Well, you know Chandler.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No I dont know Chandler! Not anymore! Its like its like somethings changed.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Maybe you changed?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I didnt change!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Maybe thats the problem.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Chandler is a complex fellow, one who is unlikely to take a wife.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Is that some kind of boat talk?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I dont know!  I havent totally decided how to talk on my boat yet.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What does he think? Does he think Im just gonna wait around for nothing?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Monica face it, Chandler is against marriage. And-and always will be!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Well theres some people who do want to marry me.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: There are?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah! Richard!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: R-R-Richard said he wants to marry you?!  And-and Chandlers tellin ya how much he hates marriage?!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Thats right.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Chandler loves marriage!!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: You just told me that he hates marriage! That-that hes a-a complex fellow whos unlikely to take a wife! That-that hes against marriage and always will be!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: You got that from what I said?!

lines.speaker: narrator
lines.text: When the Cretaceous period ended, the dinosaurs were gone.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What happened you guys?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Rach!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Hey you!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hey, come on in.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh thank you. Hey yknow, Im so sorry to hear about you and Elizabeth.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh, thanks. Yeah, I really thought wed be able to make it work, but uh, I guess it just wasnt meant to be.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah, love. Its a tricky business isnt it?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: So what do you say we make a pact? If you and I are both single by the time were 40, we get married. I mean, we know each other, we like each other, and weve-weve already slept together so yknow therell be no surprises there! You know what I mean? No like, "Whats that?!"

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Right. Ohh! You-you want me to be your backup.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ohh, yeah I already have one.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: What? Who?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Phoebe.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Phoebe?! Wait abut-but she just, she said that Joey was her backup.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ohh, I dont think so.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ross! I just had a conversation with her, and she said that she and Joey made a deal!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Thats impossible! I mean we have had a deal for years! We-we-we shook on it, although believe me she wanted to do a lot more than that.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Where the hell have you been?!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I was making a coconut phone with the professor.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Richard told Monica he wants to marry her!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah, Ive been trying to find ya to tell to stop messing with her and maybe I would have if these  damn boat shoes wouldnt keep flying off!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: MyOh my God!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I know! They suck!!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Hes not supposed to ask my girlfriend to marry him! Im supposed to do that!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I know!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well what Yknow what Im gonna do? Im gonna go over there; Im gonna kick his ass!  Will you help me?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Look, Chandler I dont think us getting our asses kicked is a solution. Okay? Just go and find Monica!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Youre right.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Okay.  Im gonna get the ring! Im gonna get the ring!  Im gonna go find her and  Im just going to propose!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Okay great.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Dude-dude-dude!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Let me know about that coconut phone, it might great for the boat.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Hi.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Hi.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I dont know why Im here.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: I didnt ask. You wanna come in?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I dont know.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Oh, okay. Well, Ill just leave the door open and go sit on the couch.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Chandler is such an idiot!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Drink?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah, Ill have a scotch

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: on the rocks with a twist? I remember.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Still smoking cigars?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Uh, no! No! Thats art! If it bothers you I can put my art out.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No thats, thats okay.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: So Monica let me ask you a question. Yknow, since we broke up do you ever, think about me?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Uh yeah, I-I actually I thought about you a couple months ago.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Oh really?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah but it was because I-I had an eye exam and I dont like my new eye doctor.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Who is it?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Edward Nevski?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Yeah hes no good. Do you ever  think about me in a  non-eye doctor way?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Ahh.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: But getting over was the hardest thing that Ive ever had to do. And I never let myself think about you.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Phoebe! You picked Joey and Ross?! You can not have two backups!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Of course I can! Its just good sense to backup your backup! Look, Ive already lost Chandler!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: What?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hey!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Phoebe! Were both  your backup?!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Phoebe, how could you do this to me?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I dontLook I dont know what youre complaining about now? You were both aware of the situation!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: No we werent!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I was not!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Okay, this kind of back talk is not gonna fly when were married!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Phoebe you cant have both of them! You have to pick one!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Pick me!!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No! Pick me! I dont want to end up an old maid!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: All right well lets see, Ross is a good father, but Joey has a boatThis is hard!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: This is crazy! Hey look, I wanna switch to Rachel!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ooh, I wanna switch to Rachel too!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: No wait! JustOkayJust wait! You guys! Wait you guys! Dont make any rash decisions, okay? Just remember my promise, when we get married, three times a week.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh God, Phoebe!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Im talking about massages.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay, yknow what?! I know-I know how to settle this! All right here, this is what were gonna do! Im gonna write Joey on one napkin  and Im gonna right Ross on the other napkin  and we are going to pick one! And that person is going to be our backup! Okay?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Okay thats fair.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: All right.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Good!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Pick one.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Left!  Thank you.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Youre welcome.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Ross!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Joey!  We should just switch.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah absolutely!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I missed you-you ugly, flat faced old freak!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Excuse me?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh!  Him.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Oh.  Whew!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I missed this apartment! Now, this is a grown-ups apartment! Yknow, I-I should be with a grown-up, do you know what I mean?!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Yeah! Youre saying, you need to be with someone more mature. Maybe someone with, a license to practice medicine. Or a mustache.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yknow, lets face it, Im not a kid anymore! I-I need to be with someone who-who wants the same things that I do! I mean coming to my place of work and telling me that you love me, I want that! Talking about pig sex over lunch, I dont want that!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: I think thats fair.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Fair? Please dont even talk to me about fair! Fair wouldve been you wanting to marry me back then! Or fair wouldve been Chandler wanting to marry me now! Believe me, nothing about this is fair! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Its okay! Shh! Hey. Hey.  Shhhh.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Nothing.  I dont knUmm. I dont know. Umm

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: I know.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yknow, I-I I have to figure some stYknow, some stuff before I can

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Yeah, I understand. Take as much time as you want.  Ten, even twenty minutes if you need it. Ill be here. Not smoking.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Chandler.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Where is she? Im not scared of you!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Shes not here and please come in.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Scotch on the rocks, with a twist, on a coaster? Ha-ha, Monica! Monica!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Okay, she was here, but she left.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well where did she go?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Well she said she had to think things over.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh my God, I cant believe this! Yknow, I thought I thought you were a good guy.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Oh, hey look nothing happened.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Nothing happened? Nothing? So you didnt tell my girlfriend that you love her?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Well all right, one thing happened?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yknow what? I cant believe this! Do you know what you did? My girlfriend is out there thinking things over! You made my girlfriend think!!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Well Im sorry.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: And what does she have to think about? I love her!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Well, apparently Im willing to offer her things that you are not.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: But I am willing to offer her all those things. This was just a plan, yknow? A way to throw her off course so that when I offered her all these things, shed be surprised!

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: Well if it helps, it worked very well.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: It was working until you showed up, you big tree! I mean, this isnt fair. You had your chance with her! You had your chance and you blew it! And this is my chance and I am not going to blow it because we are meant for each other! And this is all just been one stupid mistake!  I was gonna propose tonight.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: You were gonna propose?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah I even  got a ring.  Did you get a ring?

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: No I dont have a ring!  You go get her Chandler.  And can I give you a piece of advice? If you do get her, dont let her go. Trust me.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yknow Richard you are a good guy.

lines.speaker: richard
lines.text: I know.  I hate that!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Dude!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I cant talk to you now, I gotta find Monica!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Shes gone.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Shes gone. She had a bag and she left.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: She was all crying. She-she said you guys want different things, and that and that she needed time to think.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well why didnt you stop her?! Why didnt you just tell her it was a plan?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I-I did! I told her everything, Chandler! But she wouldnt believe me.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well where Where did she go?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: To her parents I think and she said you shouldnt call her. But if I were you I would.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I cant believe I ruined this.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I am so sorry man.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: You wanted it to be a surprise.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Chandler In all my life I never thought I would be so lucky.  As to fall in love with my best my best Theres a reason why girls dont do this!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Okay!  Okay! Okay! Oh God, I thought  Wait a minute, I-I can do this.  I thought that it mattered what I said or where I said it. Then I realized the only thing that matters is that you,  you make me happier than I ever thought I could be.  And if youll let me, I will spend the rest of my life trying to make you feel the same way.  Monica, will you marry me?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yes.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I knew you were likely to take a wife!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Can we come it yet?! Were dying out here!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Come in! Come in!  Were engaged!!!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ohhh, this is the least jealous Ive ever been!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh no wait no, this is wrong! Ross isnt here!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh hell, hes done this three times! He knows what its about!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah!
